NpcTalk_005: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Is there anything else you want to know?
AfterGF_NPC_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Once again, we owe you so much. Not
only did you save the village, you helped
set Tulin straight.<sp:0:4:0>The Rito will never forget this debt.
It is now our turn to aid you.<sp:0:4:0>You can leave the Hebra Mountains to us.
We'll scour them and find you your lead
on Princess Zelda.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_01>Our hearts are always with you, Link.
Remember that. And don't be a stranger.
NpcTalk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>I've told you what I know. Unless you
wanted to hear it again?
AfterGF_NPC_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>We will repay the debt we owe to you.
When we turn up a lead on Princess
Zelda, you'll be the first to know.
NpcTalk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's the name of a ship that features in
an old Rito children's song.<sp:0:4:0>As the song goes, long ago when a
disaster threatened our village, a god
sent us a <clr:0000>great flying ship<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The blessed winds created by the ship
put everything right.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Doesn't sound like something that really
happened, huh? But this never-ending
blizzard counts as a disaster to me.<sp:0:4:0>I'd take anything if it would save us from
this. Even a children's story.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0200>I guess the truth is somewhere up there
past that ominous cloud...
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Why don't you have the Great Eagle Bow?
Did it break or something?<sp:0:4:0>Well, if you collect some materials and
bring them here, I can remake it for you.<sp:0:4:0>I'll need five bundles of wood, three
diamonds, and a swallow bow.<sp:0:4:0>I can't help you without all of those
things, so be sure to bring back enough.
NpcTalk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Haven't heard anything myself. Did you
try asking Harth?<sp:0:4:0>He has good sources. If anyone has a lead
on Princess Zelda, it would be him.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>You'll find Harth in the <clr:0000>lodge to the north<clr:ffff>.
If you get lost, use the <clr:0000>pair of bonfires<clr:ffff>
they keep burning as a landmark.
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>That Great Eagle Bow is nice, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I made it, but my work has the seal
of approval from Harth, the Rito's
greatest craftsman.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Take good care of it, and it'll take care of
you in return.
Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh? I don't see the Great Eagle Bow on
you anywhere. Did you decide not to
take it with you?<sp:0:4:0>I'll remind you that bow is a masterpiece
which has the seal of approval from
Harth, the Rito's greatest craftsman.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300>So try not to lose it, will you?<sp:3:0:2:0000>
Talk0020_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, Link. Good of you to come!
NpcTalk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right, then. If you decide to visit Harth,
take care of yourself.<sp:0:4:0>The closer you get to that cloud, the
<clr:0000>colder it'll get<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>You'll need to take extra
precautions against the blizzard.
Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_01>Until we get our old lives back, there's
a mountain of things I need to see to.<sp:0:4:0>I'm on my way home to think about our
next steps.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I've got a long way before I can live up to
Kaneli when it comes to being elder.
Talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>None of us had any time for leisure while
the blizzard was still a problem.<sp:0:4:0>But now that it's behind us, I can take the
time to tinker with my newly crafted bow.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>It's nice knowing my son is using the
same bow that I do.
NpcTalk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_01>Managing food reserves and supplies,
granting audiences and such...this village-
elder gig just isn't sitting right with me.<sp:0:4:0>Life was so much easier when all I had to
do was hunt. Just me and my bow...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>But you didn't come to hear me complain.<sp:5:0:0>
What can I help you with?
NpcTalk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hello, Link. Is there something you need
help with?
NpcTalk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If there's anything I can answer for
you, ask.
